quest_desc.qdesc: 1. 주교와 대화. 2. 버려진 윌든 할로우로. 3. 벨스커드 vs 제레인트 싸움을 목격. 4. 주교에게 돌아와 보고.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Duke Stuart$
Well... Once we had more information on the location of the Prophet, I would imediately send out the troops.
That all for today. Please leave.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$King Cassius$
Hmm.. A.h.emm. I would make a decision with regards about the Prophet once General Douglas has arrived
Well then... Y..you wil come again am I right?
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I'm going to find out what that sly Bishop is up to. No information was retrieve despite sending out all those troops. I will never believe this

$General Douglas$
I have just returned to the Fortress after completing a different a mission. As I have yet to listen on the details of it, I do not have anything to update you for now.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Elite Soldier$
I have reported, so everything should turn out well.
The King will probably take care of everything.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
We must quickly find the Prophet, but one thing that worried me we do not have any troops that can be sent out now.
I don't know what must be done about this.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>What kind of help can I give you?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Oh yes? You would?
Just doing nothing and waiting for the Royal Castle's support is futile. Let's join forces and start searching for the Prophet.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Hmm... I'd like to get your help, but you look so tired.
(Get to Level 24 to proceed.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
I had received a recent report that was nerve racking.
A Templar Knight had spotted a man presumed to be the Black Knight.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>If you aren't certain it was the Black Knight, I could confirm it for you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
However, the person presumed to be the Black Knight was spotted alone. There was no sign of the Prophet with him. I need someone to go and check this out.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Templar Knights saw the The Black Knight at the Foothills of Black Mountain.
A suspicious person was seen heading towards Abandoned Welton Hollow. You may want to check it out.

$King Cassius$
Ah... Regarding the Prophet, I will discuss and make a decision after General Douglas has returned.
So... you will come again, right?
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But if I don't look for him...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Duke Stuart$
I understand that we need to find the Prophet. But I am unable to leave as I need to protect the young King. I am very sorry for not being able to help.

$Duke Stuart$
I'm sorry, but please try to understand. I will send out the troops once we have confirmation of the Prophet whereabouts. That's all for today.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>But if the Prophet is not found...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
I'm going to expose the Bishop true colors. Humph... Would you believe that nothing was gained after sending out all the Templar Knights! It's a grave mistake if he thinks that I'm just a mere Sorceress.

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
Are you giving orders to a Court Sorceress?
Dare you to ignore me! Did I ever say that we wouldn't go look for the Prophet?
The general, the duke, and the bishop did not even act yet, why must we be the first to go?

$Court Sorceress Kayleen$
My followers are all elite Sorceresses. Does it even make sense to use such troops for such a pointless war of attrition?! Humph!

$General Douglas$
I have just returned to the Fortress after receiving another mission. I haven't heard of the details yet. I do not have time to talk to you right now.
(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Elite Soldier$
After the Black Knight's attack, many of our men have been injured, and we have even lost the Prophet. I am deeply ashamed. But thanks to you, {user_nick}, we know the whereabout of the Prophet. The King should be pleased.

$Elite Soldier$
I am sure. I have submitted the report. I hope all goes well.
The King will dealt with it.BR>(Talk to Bishop Ignacio.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Abandoned Welton Hollow has become a desolate land due to the erosion of an unknown power. If The Black Knight has really headed towards that place, I really don't understand what he is up to. Well anyway, may the Goddess bless us.

$Bishop Ignacio$
What? The Black Knight really appear there?
Please explain what has happened.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Could be a knight of the Fortress?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Are you saying that a blond-haired swordsman was fighting The Black Knight?
Hmm... Is that blond-haired swordsman seeking the Prophet as well... Or...

$Bishop Ignacio$
That's couldn't be. It is very rare to find a swordsman who can fight The Black Knight. Also, if such a person was sent, then General Douglas would have reported to me.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>It seems... There could be someone who may know where is The Black Knight.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
We do not know where The Black Knight has hidden the Prophet. Thus we need to continue to pursue him. However, we do not know his objectives or whereabouts...

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Yes. She has always been pursuing The Black Knight.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Are you sure that there is still someone who may know where The Black Knight is?
Is this true?

$Bishop Ignacio$
If you are refering about a women, I believed you are talking about that Silver-Haired Swordswoman who helped you at Calderock Village.What was her name?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Eye witness Account
journal.contents:
Talk to Bishop Ignacio about rescuing the Prophet.

Saint Haven Fortress → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: Abandoned Welton Hollow
journal.contents:
You have obtained information from Bishop Ignacio that The Black Knight has headed towards Abandoned Welton Hollow.

Foothills of Black Mountain(Lonely Forest Path) → Abandoned Welton Hollow
journal.destination: Chase after The Black Knight at Abandoned Welton Hollow
journal.todo_msg: Chase after The Black Knight at Abandoned Welton Hollow

journal.title: Another Knight
journal.contents:
You witnessed The Black Knight fighting the blond swordsman, but you lost them. Return to Saint Haven Fortress and talk to Bishop Ignacio about it.

Saint Haven Fortress → Bishop Ignacio
journal.todo_msg: Report to Bishop Ignacio about what you have witnessed.
